name: Fsoteras.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Fernando Soteras personal page (on construction).
Career summary 
Fernando is a responsible, hardworking, knowledgeable and approachable person. On 2012 he 
entered Globant’s “Enterprise Consumerization” Studio within O&M group. There he worked in 
several projects and continued developing his skills in OOP programming within the .Net framework 
and it’s many libraries required for LOB applications. Lately he has been learning F#.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
